description:
Night riding curious? This powerful headlamp will show you the way. Brighter than most motorcycle headlights, the 3500S can light every corner of the trail. 15 different modes, 3 lighting styles adapt to slow climbs, flowing single track or gnarly descents.

  • All light modes have 5 levels: 100%, 50%, 25%, 10% and flashing
  • Hybrid mode combines spot (21º spread) and flood (32º spread)
  • Hybrid at 100% (1.42h at 3500 lumens), 50% (3.12h at 1800 lumens), 25% (6.3h at 900 lumens), 10% (17h at 350 lumens) and flash (6.3h at 1800 lumens)
  • Light locks into lowest setting when power is 5% or less
  • Single button control works with gloves, remembers last mode used
  • USB rechargeable 5200mAh battery straps to frame
  • Battery doubles as a USB powerbank (5V, 2A output)
  • 4-level LED battery status light works when charging or in use
  • Machined aluminum housing with integrated heat sync reduces heat build up
  • IP65 weatherproofing keeps light shining in heavy downpours
  • Integrated Garmin ½ turn mount gives you options to use existing mounts
  • Includes mounting straps for handlebar diameters (25.4, 28, 31.8, 35mm and aerobars)
name: Magicshine MONTEER 3500S Front Light
